alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 8:08AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Kings and western Nassau Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 807 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Forest Hills, or over Jamaica, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Flushing, Freeport, Valley Stream, Glen Cove, Garden City, Lynbrook, Mineola, Woodmere, Westbury, Great Neck, Kennedy Airport, Jackson Heights, Forest Hills and Canarsie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
